pages.privacy-policy: OpalOasis - Privacy Policy OpalOasis Home About us Casino Contacts OpalOasis Hotel - Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy describes how OpalOasis Hotel ("we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, and discloses your personal information when you use our website (the "Website"). Information We Collect We collect several different types of information for various purposes to improve your experience on our Website. Personal Information: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, mailing address, and billing information when you make a reservation, subscribe to our newsletter, or contact us. Usage Data: We may also collect usage data such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, referral source, length of visit, and pages viewed. This information is used to analyze trends, administer the Website, track user movement on the Website, and gather broad demographic information. Data Security We take reasonable steps to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no internet transmission is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the security of your information. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on the Website. The OpalOasis website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline Disclaimers Privacy & Policy Terms & Conditions
